changeSet.author: aru
changeSet.sql:
declare @insCompanyId int = (select ICRFNBR from InsComp where CompanyCode = 'SCALEPOINT')
EXEC autotests_create_service_agreements @insCompanyId, 'serviceAgreement_autotests', 'serviceAgreement_NameWizzard','FUTURE50'
EXEC autotests_create_service_agreements @insCompanyId, 'serviceAgreement_autotests1', 'serviceAgreement_NameWizzard1','FUTURE51'
EXEC autotests_create_service_agreements @insCompanyId, 'serviceAgreement_autotests2', 'serviceAgreement_NameWizzard2','FUTURE52'
EXEC autotests_create_service_agreements @insCompanyId, 'serviceAgreement_autotests3', 'serviceAgreement_NameWizzard3','FUTURE53'
